extends net.minecraft.item.ItemTool
implements SteamChargable, Engineerable, SteamTool

      • itemForStrength

        private final net.minecraft.item.Item itemForStrength
        The Item used in getStrVsBlock. Basically, assuming there are no strength modifying upgrades, this item's getStrVsBlock(ItemStack, IBlockState) will be called to determine the strength (along with the speed, of course).
